website_summaries.verdict: The Asus MX239H offers solid IPS color and viewing angle performance in a sleek 23-inch desktop monitor. Its grayscale performance could be better, though.
pros: Good color and viewing angle performance

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: After doing weeks of research, I really liked the overall specs of this monitor for my budget range. After setting up,everything went downhill from there. The picture was very crisp and clear but the colors were awful....not even close to what I had hoped for. I tried literally for hours to get a decent color scheme that looked somewhat realistic and close to my IPad Pro display, but nothing worked. The “touch sensitive” controls are not very user friendly which did not help in trying to attain a decent display. I do not think my expectations were too high, I just wanted a monitor that performed as promised. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: PALMITER

customer_reviews.title: Love this LED monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2nd monitor to match my current main monitor. I tried another HP LCD monitor but it was really dark and not very clear. Decided to see if I could still find this model MX239H and was able to at just a few dollars more than the HP. The LED is super bright and matches my other monitor perfectly. Clarity on HDMI is great and VGA is really good too. I run a security camera system which I share on this 2nd monitor with my laptop and works great for both viewings as I switch between them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nastally

customer_reviews.title: ASUS MX239H 23-Inch is a HORRIBLE MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these (ASUS MX239H 23-Inch) and they both have a slight tilt to them. I had to spend and additional $60.00 ($30.00 each) for brackets to mount on vesa a stands. I thought that may solve my problem, but it didn't. I had to put a space between them so the tilt would not be as niticible. If you are looking for a multi-monitor setup, look elsewhere. They do not line up well. On top of that, they sound like crap. You can return them, but they will charge you to ship them back. The only pro is that they do look nice as standalone monitors. Total let down.
customer_reviews.author: A. GRINES

customer_reviews.title: I am very surprised with this from  ASUS
customer_reviews.text: ASUS was the top of the line for anything! But this monitor is junk! Ya it works, but I don't know for how long! ASUS would NOT WORRINTY this at all and said to send it back to amazon! Amazon gave me my money back and said to junk it! Well that tells you what this monitor is! JUNK if no one even amazon wants it back! Just a big waist of my time! I went out and bought something that is a lot better from somewhere else!
customer_reviews.author: stephen brown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is the first monitor I have ever purchased. I have a gaming laptop and wanted a bigger screen for playing games. Great size, great resolution, no issues at all! It is very sleek looking and it looks great on my desk. Only flaw it doesn't come with a HDMI cable to connect to my laptop, as I cannot use the other connections. That is not a big deal as HDMI cables are extremely cheap and easy to find. This is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Size matters.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome. It's big, sleek, and affordable. The three things anyone looks for when buying a monitor. I love the grey accents and buttons beneath the monitor for adjusting various things like color, brightness, etc. The only complaint I have is that the monitor wobbles some if you're a faster type. However, if you elevate the monitor (on a book or similar surface), it seems to alleviate the "problem". All in all, I'd buy a second one to have dual monitor capability but my desk isn't big enough. When it is, consider another monitor purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: in used- like new condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this screen on march 2014, from amazon warehouse deals, in used- like new condition. It has been more than 3 years and this screen has been used daily for playing games, photo editing, and watching movies. To this day I really like the design and will purchase another asus monitor when its time to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Bon G. Ripper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but flawed
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this monitor. I use it as a TV in my kitchen hooked up to Amazon TV with Playstation Vue. It fits right in with the stainless appliances. The screen is gorgeous and can been seen at any angle at least it seems like it can. There is only one flaw and that is the controls are touch sensitive and especially hard to use. Just to adjust the volume up or down is the problem as the rest stay where they are 99.9% percent of the time. Otherwise I could give it 5 Stars. Because of the frustration of crummy controls I have to knock it down two stars.
customer_reviews.author: eikaun

customer_reviews.title: 4 years and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: Getting close to 4 years and still hooked up to my PS4, still no issues or regrets. Definitely got my money's worth. Love the brightness and the saturation. The built in speaker isn't bad for YouTube but I recommend external speakers for listening to music, streaming Netflix etc. I mainly only use this for console gaming so I use a headset.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. They screen quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. They screen quality is amazing, they are may favorite monitors I've ever owned. I use mine for office work about 8 hrs per day, and high end gaming in 2k and 4k. These screens are GORGEOUS. Check out the 27s, I may get rid of these 23s, they are great but the 27s are like WOW
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jayerson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picture, outstanding built in speakers.
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality, Speakers are amazing for being built in monitor speakers! They sound almost as good as my Logitech desk speakers. image is very sharp and colors are very nice. The monitor's buttons are like a touch function, rather than click. They are elegant, matching the quality of the whole body. It also comes with a few useful wires, and they are a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: charm

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this monitor for 3 years now and have never had an issue. The built in speakers aren't incredible quality, but they are extremely convenient as many other monitors don't have this functionality. I've taken this thing apart and transported it at least a dozen times and have never had a problem with disassembly or reassembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Have Two
customer_reviews.text: I have a 27" and a 23", so if you're wanting to see the comparison between, here you go. These screens are amazing and so is the sound. No sound system required unless you're wanting ridiculous bass. I play a wide variety of games and these screens handle the graphics flawlessly. I highly recommend these monitors. Easy to assemble the stand and get running. I run my 27" straight hdmi then my 23" hdmi to dvi and both work together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a remote monitor for our security system and it works great. we have a 25 ft cable connected to it and we have no problem with resulution it has a very light touch power .
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Great price. Hooked it up to my MacBook Pro. Tried the thunderbolt-hdmi cable and then hdmi-hdmi cable. The hdmi-hdmi cable gets a clearer picture. Don't know why but for me works better. Really happy with price. Bought a 28inch ultra hd Samsung 4K from Costco for 300 but returned it cause it was to big for my desk/work area. Never thought I'd say a TV is to big but it was for my needs. This monitor fits perfect and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my MacBook Air. Great size, great color. Only bad thing I can say is something someone else said and I didn't get it until I unpacked the monitor. The "brick" power pack was so unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Z. D. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Incredible colours and back-lighting. I use it as extra monitor for web/app design (paired with a Macbook Pro retina). - Pixel quality is of course not as good as a retina, but absolutely too good for a Full HD display. - Its design is awesome, minimalistic and very solid. - Built-Quality went beyond my expectations when I opened the box. Cons: - The settings buttons in the bottom are really complicated to use specially in the beginning and comes with some unnecessary options that I hate. - I didn't come with a HDMI cable. Wtf? - Don't expect a super good sound. But it's decent. Bottomline: I really recommend this display, specially for design or developing tasks.
customer_reviews.author: wilmermurillo

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary expanded monitor to my iMAC. It has good color, resolution and clarity. Physically it looks good from afar, but when you get up close you can see that cheap, low quality materials were used and the construction is substandard. Within a couple of days the aluminum strip at the bottom of the monitor started lifting up (seems only double sided tape holds this on). The touch sensor menu buttons seem kind of cool in concept, but the reality is, it is easy too easy to touch the wrong sensor bringing you into the wrong menu, which you then have to then navigate out of. The menu layout is not terribly intuitive either.
customer_reviews.author: Diemthy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: but it is nice to know that it has good quality speakers I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the audio quality from the built-in speakers. I won't be using them, but it is nice to know that it has good quality speakers I can use in a pinch. After 6 months of use, I have had no issues with the screen. The controls and the buttons take a bit getting used to, but I find I don't have to mess with them much if at all. I am considering building a desktop and I have no qualms with buying another monitor to match the one I have.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: ... and have to say they are some of the best monitor's I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these now and have to say they are some of the best monitor's I have ever bought. Although I haven't attempted to mount them on any brackets, the basic stands they come with keep them nice and sturdy and out of the way of cords. With the thin borders on the edges of the screen, lining two monitors side by side makes it almost appear to be one large screen. I would recommend to anyone looking for a good budget monitor that is going to stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Osman

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Display, Build, and Price.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'm not huge on specs, but this computer is beautiful. I bought two of them, and they are so aesthetically pleasing it's ridiculous. To people who say IPS doesn't make a difference, it does. The colors are so true and vivid, there's no way I could go back now. People were saying though that the speakers are great, they're not. But why would you buy a monitor for its speakers anyways? The bezel also makes for a great looking dual monitor setup. Overall, the price is great, the display is stunning, and the build is gorgeous to look at. For it's price range, it's the best in its class.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. The monitors have an ergonomic design and are intended for multipurpose use. A range of themes are available for movie aficionados, graphic designers and for every day uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dawit

customer_reviews.title: Really nice monitor for the price though those heavy gamers will ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor for the price though those heavy gamers will want something far superior. Built in Audio is good enough for You Tube and regular use, but I personally find its not so good for Netflix, look at some decent speakers based on your needs.
customer_reviews.author: O. K. Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for gaming and photos
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has treated me very well over the past year, and I still love. Out of the box, the colors are very true to life, but I prefer to up the saturation levels a tiny bit.Overall, the aesthetics to this monitor are outstanding. I have to give some props to Asus for the overall build quality of this monitor. It feels very sturdy and is rather solid to the touch. I could not recommend this monitor enough to people who want a good looking display, especially those in the market for an ips display.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but slight issues
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is very appealing and the picture and colors are great. My issues are the internal speakers sound cheap (I wasn't expecting to be blown away though) and when I connected this to my brand new PC it wouldn't work until I was able to get Windows 7 installed and passed the BIOS screen. If your PC won't run on the monitor, try a console to test it before you attempt to return it. My Xbox 360 worked fine through HDMI so I knew it was something with the monitor not acquiring the picture. It was hassle connecting everything to my TV but it the end it does work now and I don't have anymore problems.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a master tech guy, so can't give you specs. This is the best looking and it is the largest monitor I have ever had. I do Excel split screens and it gives me all kinds of area to work. The color is good, and plenty of menu buttons at bottom. The sound is better than any monitor I've ever had. With the power off it has no frame, when on, there is a 3/8 " frame area visible. I also like the flat black screen surface. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Huffstidler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture but deffected most probably
customer_reviews.text: It is a great monitor, I was in love with it so much that I bought 2 to replace my older monitor, I needed 2 all together, but the monitor keeps turning off randomly and then it comes back on, it happens every day on both the new monitors, so I had to return them and settle for another monitor but I really wish it didn't have that problem cuz I loved these monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Laughing Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor: Dual input an amazing feature
customer_reviews.text: An amazing monitor. The dual input allowed me to remove one monitor from my (I kid you not) six monitor setup. I have a home system and an employer laptop/docking station.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Grove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice HD monitor with excellent resolution, decent speakers for what I need it for. I also really like the frameless feature and the attractive stand that allows for some minor adjustments. I needed this to pair with a 17" laptop for simple web browsing, email, using Office products (Word, Excel and Powerpoint). While I wish I could have afforded to buy a larger monitor, the 23" performs well, and I have had no issues with this monitor and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a second monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my Macbook Air because I'm tired of looking at the small screen. This is great for the work I need to do. The sharpness is great and now I don't have to squint.
customer_reviews.author: austinmay

customer_reviews.title: Good screen but really poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and the quality of the screen. The ONLY thing I want to complain is the build-in speaker. Even if you maximize the volume, it is not loud --just too light. Moreover, the sound quality is really bad. I cannot hear words clearly from the speaker. In addition, I have bought the 25-inch version monitor. The speaker in that model is much much better. Hope this review can help some people.
customer_reviews.author: Lizhi Xing

customer_reviews.title: umfff
customer_reviews.text: umffff The stand feels like a heavy piece of metal which is great coming from a mostly plastic stand monitor. umfff The thin border of this monitor really makes it look big, without taking up much space as other monitors. umff VERY THIN! does not weigh a lot. umfff the ports on the back are easy to get to when installing on tight space builds, or small desk tops. umff at first seems like its too wide, but after using it long enough you learn to love it for that exact reason. umff
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. They are pretty decent. I did notice a drop in sound using the headphone jack, so I ended up just plugging my headphones directly into the PC instead of the monitor. I would have rated this monitor 5 stars, if it had built in USB ports for thumb drives and wireless keyboard/mouse receivers. It helps to get the wireless receivers up near the monitor, and out of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I was building a computer in late 2015 and wanted a nice monitor. Aesthetics was important, so I ended up spending a little bit more to get a slimmer, prettier product. I own quite a few of the more inexpensive ASUS products as well. Beautiful design and after more than a year, I am still very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor; DO NOT BUY USED
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great colors Beautiful monitor Great stand Two hdmi Great built in audio(for a monitor) Really nice color presets Cons: There seem to be a good chunk of defective monitors on the market(not from asus but third party sellers who sell used models The way this monitor refreshes might not be for you if you are worried about snappiness because it does take 1-2 seconds for it to update. I bought mine used, however the motherboard inside was defective and thank god it was still under warranty). DO NOT BUY USED FROM 3rd PARTY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dual monitor setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use as a dual monitor setup. The narrow bezel's are very nice when moving back and forth between screens.The integrated speakers do what they are supposed to but daisy chaining them doesn't work. You will need to split the audio coming from the computer to use both sets if using a dual monitor setup. The audio isn't anything to write home about but this is a work computer for me and I think the boss might get agitated at the bass coming from the office.
customer_reviews.author: Winger

customer_reviews.title: I like my new monitor...
customer_reviews.text: Is big enough to work with, I mean I code a lot so reading and developing on this monitor is great, and now I can rest in my bed and watch some movies without moving the screen to adjust it to my angle like I use to do it with my laptop. ( yes I have a small room so this size is ok ). I am satisfied with my purchase, but as a consumerist I think the 27-inch of this series will be better, but that will depend on how much you want to pay...
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great monitor. I purchased this for the everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. I purchased this for the everyday use, but I actually started gaming on it as well. If you are looking for monitor mainly for gaming, I suggest looking at a few others with a faster response time. For a everyday use, this is perfect. I had this for a few months now and so far everything is still working great. The screen doesn't reflect light, very "sexy" monitor with the black finish on the back, but its not frameless as it looks on the pic. There are small bars that show once once the monitor is on, but you can barely notice them.
customer_reviews.author: Good K.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the sound goes out after I turn the screen back on, after it's been off for a while. I have to turn the screen off and on again to get the sound going. I thought it was a Windows 10 thing, but I tried it on an older computer with Windows 7 and it did the same thing. Would return it if I had kept the box, but I didn't. The picture quality is good though.
customer_reviews.author: sghaua

customer_reviews.title: Pivot arm jammed on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Pivot arm jammed on back of monitor; could not move at all, felt like any more force would break it. ASUS tech support useless. Documentation useless. Returned item, will try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fred S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I have two in my room and they both work great. No issues at all with either one and I definitely recommend it. They also look great. I use them to watch movies, edit pictures/videos, play video games, and study. They do everything well.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: No dead pixels- stunning color so far. I may ...
customer_reviews.text: No dead pixels- stunning color so far. I may order a second & run two monitors. Only issues was the box had no HDMI cable. Everything else. I had to run out & buy an extra one for the PC. But after a day I am extremely impressed. Charlie
customer_reviews.author: C J Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution and appearance. Great price. Just wish it would work without my having to keep my laptop open, which the Asus rep said was "normal" although it wasn't my experience with my Apple monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: in my house
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works perfectly with my xbox one s and i want to buy later with 4k and soon comprarè another monitor I liked a lot that is why i give five stars
customer_reviews.author: Beder Galvan

customer_reviews.title: get on this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im speechless with this screen by far to me the best monitor. The resolution and the coloring is just so sharp and clean. I would recommend this piece of hardware and it's a decent size length wise too.
customer_reviews.author: Zunedge

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product great space great build quality will defiantly buy again. Fantastic speakers amazing image quality absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Matte Finish Screen and Great Looking Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these from Warehouse Deals and they each came in flawless condition aside from the exterior of the box - it only had tape pull marks on the packaging. So I got a great price on a very nice monitor. They perform well for gaming, movies, browsing and all-around general use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Great picture, do yourself a favor and buy speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Super picture, and a clean look, the audio is not quite as good as the specs suggest, but can you expect from speakers mounted inside on a flat screen cabinet. $50.00 dollars cheaper than anywhere else that paid for the 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Das Loffel

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor - bought this for a home office for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor - bought this for a home office for my MacBook Pro. All I had to do was plug in a HDMI cable and it was up and running. The buttons on the bottom of the monitor are a little hard to use but that hasn't been a concern for me as I haven't had to adjust anything.
customer_reviews.author: ahhndrea

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous monitors. Zero issues after 2+ years of heavy usage.
customer_reviews.text: The dark margin is definitely noticeable, but since its part of the screen (on the same level), it still looks amazing. I purchased a pair of these and placed them next to each other. The result was glorious. After 2 years of usage, have no had any issues. Only downside is placement. Be careful not to have your mouse wire running under the monitors because accidental wire touching the screen can actually push the buttons as they are so sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Pashyk

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Dang. Crystal clear, matte screen, which is nice cause it causes no glare. Around 60ish FPS for a full screen 1080p video which is awesome. And the bezels are so small and out of the way, this could easily be stacked next to two more of these with barely any space between screens
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best looking monitor out there
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year: This is still the best looking monitor out there for under $300 I have had no issues with it at all after 1 year of heavy usage. The picture quality is amazing and there is no lag or ghosting with any of the games I have played (Crysis, Assassin's Creed, NBA 2K15, Bioshock, Payday 2, etc...) I do have my PC connected to my 55" TV but sometimes I still prefer to play on this monitor because the picture quality on this IPS panel is just better.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my early 2016 Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my early 2016 Macbook Pro, but is a little finicky if the HDMI is left plugged in while the computer is sleeping. When not in use, I keep it disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Still good as new and words perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I still use the monitor everyday and it has withstood the tests of time. I have had it for about 5 years or more and it's still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is attractive and very nice. The menu buttons are very sensitive!! The only drawback which isn't a reason to pause on buying. It connected easily with the HDMI to my MAC. Nice warranty too. I looked at a dozen - this was the best - though a tad higher in price, it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1.5 years of use
customer_reviews.text: This monitor failed after a year and a half, the panel developed green and pink lines down the middle and ASUS customer support did nothing to help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Young

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I love the screen
customer_reviews.text: If you connect this via HDMI be prepared to realize it has speakers as well! Was a rather humorous moment wondering wtf the sound was coming from before I realized it. Otherwise I love the screen. Just wish it had a higher refresh at 1080+
customer_reviews.author: Fred Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant design with nice speakers.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is perhaps one of the best ones I have ever owned. Granted it is not super duper fancy with near light speed pixels, but for an everyday elegant monitor with built in speakers that sound very good, I give it 5 stars. I do some medium sized gaming as well and have noticed no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: BeamerMT79

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, using a HDMI cable. I like the built in speakers feature as it eliminates the need for more cables and power cords. For non gaming use the speakers are adequate for watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: SteveT

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor on my Mac Mini, great price too.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is really freakin awesome. It is most definitely 1080p, the only thing I don't like about it is that you can't control the volume of the speakers with the Mac Mini wireless keyboard for some reason idk why, but otherwise I love this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor that I've ever had. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Practically no borders, sleek and modern aesthetics, beautiful display, and plenty of cables provided to offer multiple connection options. It's a great deal with plenty of ports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for my computer to ship but i hooked it up to my bluray player for a little bit just to see what it would look like. So one thing i noticed that others have stated is the menu system sucks. navigating around is just awful. glad i dont have to mess around in there ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Rican408

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a monitor should. Has good color and no detectable blurring during game play. There is a bit of light leakage around the edges, but from what i understand that is normal for an IPS monitor. Speakers are clear but not super loud. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: I really like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor. Easy to use and set up. Not sure it is worth the extra cost over other monitors; it depends on what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: albanydc

customer_reviews.title: The controls on this monitor are not good. Picture and all other functions are
customer_reviews.text: The controls on this monitor are not good. Picture and all other functions are, but switching between inputs is a challenge to say the least, more like a complete exercise in frustration. Would not recommend unless you plan to only ever use one input device.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: A nice monitor at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant, crisp monitor with good sound at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I spent probably close to 2 months looking for a 23-24" monitor that had great contrast ratio, above normal build quality, and IPS panel. I have had this monitor for only a few days but already love the clarity, colors, and craftsmanship of this monitor. Couldn't have been happier with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle  Welch

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but far from perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As other review state, this is a good quality monitor. It really is let down a bit by the shocking buttons along the button that are just flawed - either they won't press down at all, or they've over sensitive. And don't think you won't use them - you will - they have the volume control for the speaker, the input control, etc. But it looks nice and the picture is sharp and crisp, so overall it's probably forgivable. I find it does a very annoying blue flash thing when my computer goes to sleep, but this might be fixable with some settings tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thomas J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a 2-3 inches scratch on the screen, but I have not returned it. Chance :( Quality is good!
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this series of monitors
customer_reviews.text: Love this series of monitors! Both the 23 and 27 inch versions. They are light weight and have great picture quality! Only drawback is that they are not VESA compatible for mounting. If they were this would be the ideal monitor.
customer_reviews.author: ECTECH

customer_reviews.title: I Purchased two for my Wife and she is happy with the size and sound
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased two for my Wife and she is happy with the size and sound. FIVE stars for me too
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. The stand was a bit tricky to set up, but the image and text quality are terrific. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lance90

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing visuals and works great! Could not have asked for a better screen!
customer_reviews.author: Volht

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and looks like a piece of art on the desk
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and looks like a piece of art on the desk. No light bleed and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor for work with my Mac and to stream movies. This is a great deal that you should not pass up.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor for the price. I purchased as an addition for dual monitors for my other ASUS screen. Resolution is great, controls are excellent and color is very palatable. Base is a bit unstable not unreasonably so however, and the design is aesthetically pleasing and saves space on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this does not have 5/5 stars. Plenty of bad reviews, but this thing is beautiful, the design is gorgeous and this actual picture quality is just as good. No problems with this at all had it for about a month now. It seem like a lot of the people giving bad reviews bought a used/refurbished one, so that may have been the problem. TLDR: Bought mine new, it's phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing display, sharp images and text, works well with a Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Dominguez Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Sounds problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor earlier in 2017 and the sound lagged out of the speakers( I would play a song via iTunes and occasionally it would cut in and out, and lag behind) Amazon handled the return very well. I am in search of a monitor again and may give it another try, let’s hope I don’t have the same issue! I had a brand new HDMI and tried with multiple.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Cagle

customer_reviews.title: I have really enjoyed these monitors
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these monitors. Very slick for the minimalist out there like me. I am not a big graphics snob so if your a gamer I'm not your reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: paul sharpe

customer_reviews.title: This thing is surprisingly loud with good sound quality as long as you use HDMI
customer_reviews.text: This thing is surprisingly loud with good sound quality as long as you use HDMI. Of course this does not compare to a high quality 5.1/7.1 speaker setup, but for most users, this will work. ASUS has issues with volume using the analog audio cable, not just with this model, but other models as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome on my glass desk. I use it for gaming. No noticeable lag. It'd be cool if it was truly frameless, the way it looks in some of the pictures. But I realize that doesn't exist yet. Looks great anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen! My only gripe is that when my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen! My only gripe is that when my computer goes to sleep it rotates between being off and waking up to a blank blue screen every few minutes... My Dell never did that.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is awesome. the built in speakers are not so bad
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is awesome. the built in speakers are not so bad. Will purchase again in the near future for dual screens. very thing bezel. loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Bee V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the monitor, he get the job done. Is got nice color and nice panel. the only down side its when you turn on the screen its take like 15 sec to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: ishai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color display. Much brighter than the monitor it is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Great design and the size is just right
customer_reviews.text: Great design and the size is just right. I would recommend this monitor for anyone looking for a crystal clear screen.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Triple screened!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Great color (IPS, what did you expect) perfect size 23". For any monitor that is 1080p 23" is HD, if you get bigger in size the HD quality goes down in quality (easier to see the pixels).
customer_reviews.author: living4U

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Of the best products that I have bought, quite comfortable and a great screen quality highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Martinez

customer_reviews.title: The monitor itself is very good. Controls are easy to access and use
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is very good. Controls are easy to access and use. The monitor has a crisp clean display. It would be better if the stand could be adjusted more for height.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in ATL

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE WALL MOUNT OPTION
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for my standing desk not realizing that they do not have wall mount ports. Now others in office are enjoying, I guess it's a good product, just not for mounting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very beautiful monitor. Modern, flat and elegant. Easy for read documents and view images in HD.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Lachapel

customer_reviews.title: The buttons at the bottom you don’t push you just touch them and they are really senestive
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest gaming monitor of all time I definitely recommend it 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was buying this monitor in order to be my second a dual monitor setup. It ended up being my primary it worked so well. Great monitor with highly customizable screen settings. Also, surprisingly, the speakers on the monitor aren't the bad.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Image is crystal clear, speakers are decent. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Big Papa Pump

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my gaming needs. It is slim with a grand design, the audio is powerful and sounds amazing, the HD quality is great! The coloring of it wonderful and it has multiple coloring modes for everyone! It also has an ability to focus on the edges of fast moving objects to make the objects look sharper without blurring. For more product information you can check out the ASUS homepage and look for it in product lookup. This is a wonderful monitor and I highly recommend it! There is a different model that is a 27 inch that is also the same just bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: great monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is a very nice IPS panel that definitely has some stunning looks. I love the stand and the connections are more than adequate. It can be a bit glowy during dark scenes and the traceless feature can add some artifacts to a scene if set to 70% or more. The sound is surprisingly quite decent for such small speakers, but it can be somewhat quiet. The colors are great as well. Owner for about 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gross

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It has great color and clarity. the screen is a perfect size to meet my needs. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: jackie Winslow

customer_reviews.title: This has truly been a great purchase. Short of buying a Thunderbolt display itself
customer_reviews.text: This has truly been a great purchase. Short of buying a Thunderbolt display itself, this is the next best option.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitors. Vivid color and great brightness
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitors. Vivid color and great brightness. Only down side is there aren't any holes on the back to put these on a desktop stand or a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: tapao

product_meta.title: ASUS Designo MX239H 23" Full HD 1920x1080 IPS HDMI VGA Frameless Monitor
product_meta.description: Inspired by millennia of artistic legacy, the new Designo MX Series sports an elegant and precision-crafted sundial design. The MX239H features an edge-to-edge frameless panel with 178° ultra-wide viewing angle AH-IPS A+ technology for incredible visuals. Power Consumption(Typical):<22W, Power Saving Mode:<0.5W, Power Off Mode:<0.5W and Voltage: 100-240V/50-60Hz.
feature_bullets: 23" Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution and AH-IPS technology with wide 178° viewing angles.

Exclusive Splendid Video Intelligence Technology automatically optimize image quality with intelligent color, brightness, contrast and sharpness. 80,000,000:1 ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio dynamically enhances the display’s contrast to delivering lifelike images.
3W x 2 stereo, RMS, with 5Wx2 Amplifier, SonicMaster sound optimization technology was co-developed by Bang & Olufsen ICEpower for premium immersive audio
Good Design Award Winner for its ultra-slim, ergonomic design with sturdy sundial-inspired stand
ASUS Rapid Replacement: 3 Years Warranty, 2 way free shipping
Inputs of dual HDMI and VGA ports. Compliance and Standards- Energy Star, BSMI, CB, CCC, CE, C-Tick, ErP, FCC, Gost-R, J-MOSS, PSE, RoHS, UL/cUL, VCCI, WEEE, WHQL (Windows 8, Windows 7)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars415 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
